title: Bug 17289 Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: The report highlights an issue where clicking on the first Combo in the Photon version does not set the focus correctly.
OB: The observed behavior is not described, but it implies that clicking on the first Combo does not set the focus as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when you click on the first Combo, which is labeled as "Host:", the focus caret should be placed in this Combo.
SR: Steps to reproduce the issue are not provided, but it is expected that clicking on the first Combo within the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog should be sufficient to trigger the problem.
